thread.title: Poland broke EU law logging ancient forest

title: Poland broke EU law logging ancient forest
text:
Poland broke EU law logging ancient forest 5:10pm BST - 01:24 
The European Union's highest court ruled on Tuesday that Poland broke EU environmental law with large-scale logging in the Bialowieza forest, an ecologically important World Heritage site home to the rare European bison. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The European Union's highest court ruled on Tuesday that Poland broke EU environmental law with large-scale logging in the Bialowieza forest, an ecologically important World Heritage site home to the rare European bison.
